pull.title: [wallet] Decouple wallet version from client version
pull.body: Instead of comparing version numbers in the wallet to the client version number, compare them to the latest supported wallet version in the client. This allows for wallet version numbers to be unrelated to the client version number.

events.message:
Decouple wallet version from client version

Instead of comparing version numbers in the wallet to the client
version number, compare them to the latest supported wallet version
in the client. This allows for wallet version numbers to be unrelated
to the client version number.

events.body: Thanks, should make testing new wallet features with master (.99 versions) a lot easier, i.e. not breaking dev's wallets.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #12992 ([wallet] Add wallet name to log messages by PierreRochard)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

little mystified why this wasn't already done, thanks
